Street Fighter 6.description: Players engage in intense one-on-one martial arts combat, utilizing special moves and combos to defeat opponents in various game modes.

Hunt: Showdown 1896.description: Hunt: Showdown 1896 is a competitive first-person bounty hunting game set in the Louisiana swamps, emphasizing strategic combat and resource management.

Wuthering Waves.description: Explore a vast, open world, engaging in intense combat encounters and uncovering a gripping narrative filled with mystery and intrigue.

Arma Reforger.description: Arma Reforger is a military simulation game set in a large open world, offering realistic combat and tactical gameplay.  Players engage in intense battles and complete various missions.

Lethal Company.description: Command a mercenary company, engaging in tactical combat, completing missions, and managing resources to survive and thrive in a war-torn world.

Arena Breakout: Infinite.description: A first-person shooter game where players engage in intense arena combat with a focus on strategic equipment management and infinite replayability.

Zenless Zone Zero.description: Players explore a sprawling urban landscape, battling enemies and uncovering mysteries in a fast-paced action game with stylish combat.

ARK: Survival Ascended.description: Players struggle to survive in a prehistoric world, taming dinosaurs, crafting items, and building bases to face various challenges and threats.

Sid Meier's Civilization VII.description: Players build and lead civilizations through history, engaging in diplomacy, warfare, and technological advancement to become the dominant world power.

SMITE 2.description: SMITE 2 offers a massive online multiplayer experience, building upon the original with expanded mythology, enhanced character customization, and new game modes.

Throne and Liberty.description: Explore a vast world, master diverse classes, and engage in thrilling large-scale battles against formidable creatures and players in a dynamic environment.

Enshrouded.description: Explore a mysterious, fog-laden world, solve environmental puzzles, and uncover a long-lost civilization's secrets.

Poppy Playtime.description: Explore a creepy abandoned toy factory, solve puzzles, and evade terrifying creatures in this single-player horror adventure.

It Takes Two.description: Two players control a married couple magically transformed into dolls, cooperating to solve puzzles and overcome challenges to reverse the spell.

DYNASTY WARRIORS: ORIGINS.description: Players experience visceral battlefield combat as legendary warriors, engaging in dynamic clashes with hordes of enemies across vast landscapes.

NHL 25.description: Play as your favorite NHL team and compete against other teams in a simulation of professional ice hockey.  Experience fast-paced action, strategic gameplay, and intense competition.

Balatro.description: Players engage in intense, fast-paced combat using a variety of weapons and abilities to defeat enemies and complete objectives.

Metaphor: ReFantazio.description: Embark on a fantastical adventure, solving puzzles, engaging in strategic combat, and uncovering the secrets of a mysterious world.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.description: Embark on a globe-trotting adventure as Indiana Jones, solving puzzles, overcoming perilous traps, and uncovering ancient secrets.

Hell Let Loose.description: A realistic World War II first-person shooter offering large-scale battles with infantry, vehicles, and strategic gameplay.

Super Mario 64.description: Players navigate 3D levels as Mario, collecting stars by completing various challenges and overcoming obstacles.

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl.description: Explore a vast, post-apocalyptic Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, battling mutants and anomalies while completing quests and uncovering the zone's secrets.

STALCRAFT: X.description: Explore a post-apocalyptic world, scavenge for resources, craft weapons and gear, and fight to survive against other players and the harsh environment.

Supermarket Together.description: Players cooperatively manage and expand a supermarket, balancing inventory, customer service, and staff management to maximize profits.

Ragnarok Online 2.description: Players explore a vast world, battle monsters, complete quests, and customize characters in this massively multiplayer online role-playing game.

The Outlast Trials.description: A terrifying psychological horror game where players endure gruesome experiments as test subjects in a Cold War-era facility.

Detroit: Become Human.description: Players experience a branching narrative as androids in a futuristic Detroit, making choices that impact the story and characters' fates.

EA Sports UFC 2.description: EA Sports UFC 2 delivers realistic mixed martial arts combat, featuring a diverse roster of fighters and a deep career mode.

Palia.description: A life simulation MMORPG where players build relationships, craft items, and explore a vibrant world with a cast of colorful characters.

Green Hell.description: Struggle to survive in the Amazon rainforest, facing harsh environmental challenges and threats from wildlife and disease.

Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 provides realistic flight simulation, featuring detailed aircraft and global scenery for immersive single-player experiences.

Teamfight Tactics.description: Auto battler game where players assemble teams of champions to battle each other, strategically positioning units and deploying items.

No Man's Sky.description: Explore and survive in a vast, procedurally generated galaxy, discovering planets, resources, and alien life.  Customize your spaceship and upgrade your equipment.

Farming Simulator 25.description: Farming Simulator 25 offers realistic farming activities, including planting, harvesting, and livestock management, in a detailed open world.

Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.description: Players engage in arena-style combat, choosing from a vast roster of iconic characters with unique movesets and special attacks.  Features both single-player and multiplayer modes.

Dying Light.description: Players fight for survival in a zombie-infested city, using parkour to traverse the environment and crafting weapons to combat hordes of enemies.

Sniper Elite: Resistance.description: Experience World War 2 as a sniper, using stealth and precision shots to eliminate targets.  Navigate diverse environments and utilize a variety of weaponry and gadgets.

New World: Aeternum.description: Explore a vast fantasy world, complete quests, craft items, and engage in large-scale PvP battles with other players.

Hello Kitty Island Adventure.description: Explore and develop Hello Kitty's island paradise, building homes, crafting items, and completing quests with friends.

The Headliners.description: Players manage a sports team, recruiting and training players, strategizing gameplay, and competing against other teams for victory.

Mir Tankov.description: Command and control tanks in large-scale armored warfare. Engage in strategic battles with diverse units and upgradeable vehicles.

The Binding of Isaac: Repentance.description: A challenging, top-down action game where players explore randomly generated dungeons, battling monsters and collecting power-ups to survive.

Exoborne.description: Embark on a sprawling space adventure, exploring diverse alien planets, engaging in epic turn-based combat, and uncovering a galaxy's mysteries.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.description: Players explore a vast open world, engaging in criminal activities, vehicle theft, and gang warfare to progress through the storyline.

Infinity Nikki.description: Dress up and style virtual fashion models with an extensive collection of clothing items and accessories, creating unique looks.

Borderlands 3.description: Explore a vast alien world, engaging in intense first-person shooting, looting diverse weaponry, and completing challenging missions.

Knight Online.description: A persistent online world where players assume the roles of knights, engaging in large-scale battles and quests.

Supermarket Simulator.description: Manage and operate a supermarket, balancing inventory, customer service, and staff management to maximize profits and efficiency.
